metadata.name: Mo Curses
metadata.description:
For now this mods add curse item with their graphics. I don't think the mod works with other mod so just in case deactivate the mod that add items.
List Of Items :
- Curse Of Death - Curse Of The Devil - Curse Of The Empress - Curse Of The Fool - Curse Of The Hanged Man - Curse Of The Magician - Curse Of The World
We were two, my friend Louis who designed everything and myself GaÃ«tan I programmed all the lua.
